sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>king</radical> has something in his hand that he's <radical>drop</radical>ping... but it bounces too! He's bouncing a <kanji>ball</kanji>
meaningInfo: This kanji looks just like a king bouncing a <kanji>ball</kanji>, no? If not, imagine the kanji itself bouncing the drop (the <kanji>ball</kanji>) over and over again, then laying some hoops like a pro.
readingMnemonic: Think of someone curled up in a ball. It is someone you know / someone famous named “Tom” (<ja>たま</ja>).
readingInfo: So, who's in a ball? Which "Tom" did you choose?
